Saw in the theatres. Not a great movie. Some good gore, really predictable ending, great actors with some the most lackluster performances of their careers. No one seems to approach this movie as a labor of love, everyone acts like they really don't care. Shame, I was really looking forward to this. It deserves the reviews it got. I still want to see it again, maybe It'll have a different effect on me the second time. It's not horrible, just .....meh.

Extreme love your work! I'm always on the lookout for your UL's.  Keep it up!!
